sourcesContent:
import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./styles.css"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import { Select } from "@material-ui/core"; import MenuItem from "@material-ui/core/MenuItem"; import { getCartData } from "./Service"; import jsonData from "./mocks/Cart.json" export const App = () => { const [cartData, setCartData] = useState(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false) const fetchCartDetails = async () => { setIsLoading(true) try { const cartDetails = await getCartData(); setCartData(cartDetails.length > 0 ? cartDetails?.results : formatRsjsonData.results) } catch (error) { alert(error) } setIsLoading(false) } const getPrice = (data) => { const id = data.id; const lastThreeDigits = (id % 1000) / 100; const formattedLastThreeDigit = `$${lastThreeDigits.toFixed(2)}` const updatedCartData = cartData.map(cartItem => ({ ...cartItem, price: formattedLastThreeDigit, })); setCartData(updatedCartData); return formattedLastThreeDigit } const calculateTotalPrice = () => { const totalPrice = cartData && cartData.reduce((total, item) => total + item?.price, 0); return totalPrice; }; useEffect(() => { fetchCartDetails() }, []) return (
Continue Shopping

My Cart

{Array.isArray(cartData) && cartData.length > 0 && cartData.slice(0,7).map(data => <>
{data.title}
{getPrice(data)}
)}

Subtotal:

{calculateTotalPrice()}

Credit Card Details

Card Type

Cardholder's Name

Card Number

Expiration Date

CVV

); }; export default App;
